password.passwordConfirmTitleText: This is used to ensure that you correctly typed in your desired password.
password.passwordTitleText: The password should include at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter, as well as a minimum of one numerical digit and special character. Additionally, it must be at least 8 characters in length.

homePage.underConstruction: This site is under construction... for the meantime, please see the {{loginPageLink}}

loginDialog.usernameTooltipText: Your username is the unique account name

registrationDialog.usernameTooltipText: Your username is the unique account name

form.firstNamePlaceholder: Your given name or first name
form.firstNameTooltip: Your given name or first name (Should be 1-256 characters in length)
form.middleNameTooltip: Your middle name (Mother's maiden surname) (Should be 1-256 characters in length)
form.lastNameTooltip: Your surname or last name (Ancestral name) (Should be 1-256 characters in length)
form.profileNameTooltip: The profile name or alias to help you identify and organize them. (Ex: 'work profile', 'gaming', 'personal')
